title: Did This Person Become Possessed? | Best of Real Ghost Stories Online
description:
What was the negative wave of energy that overcame one person in the middle of their workday?
Here is a preview of the story.
“I used to work at a historical park where we dressed in historical dress, with recreations of a few of the old buildings, some antiques from the time and area. The site is about a mile long. There is a gravel road that connects the parking lot/visitor Centre to all the different buildings, info plaques, picnic area, and church with a cemetery. We would station ourselves around the site to educate and interact with visitors.

In the morning we would drive the site to open all the buildings. Some mornings I would open a specific building and be hit with a negative wave of energy as I entered the building, like walking into a room where people are fighting, mad and aggressive. I would kindly greet the former lady of the house, ask her how her night was and tell her that we are going to have a wonderful day. I know it sounds strange and if anyone had witnessed it, they would have thought me crazy, but I swear it helped, the negativity dispersed, and I was able to stay in the house. Sometimes the day started out ok but the energy on the house would shift throughout the day, leaving me anxious, uncomfortable and spending as much time as I could outside on the picnic table.”
